subject: Sponsorship / Partnership Opportunity
description_text:
Hello!

My name is Noah, but I go by the name 'Smerph Racing' on social media. I am
reaching out to discuss collaboration opportunities. I am a full-time
content creator with over 275,000 followers on TikTok, and over 15,000
subscribers on YouTube. I livestream twice daily & create sim racing
related content on both TikTok & YouTube. I have recently come across
Simsonn sim racing products, and I am quite interested!

I would appreciate the opportunity to discuss this further, and I look
forward to hearing back. I have provided my socials below.

https://www.tiktok.com/@Smerph_Racing
https://www.youtube.com/@SmerphRacing

Thank you,
Smerph Racing
